thread.title: Hillsboro City Council Appoints Rick Van Beveren to Council Seat (City of Hillsboro, OR)
thread.title_full: Hillsboro City Council Appoints Rick Van Beveren to Council Seat (City of Hillsboro, OR) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Hillsboro City Council Appoints Rick Van Beveren to Council Seat (City of Hillsboro, OR)
text: ( Source : City of Hillsboro, OR ) The Hillsboro City Council voted unanimously on October 20 to appoint Rick Van Beveren to represent Ward 1 on the Council . Mayor Jerry Willey recommended Van Beveren to fill the Ward 1, Position B Council
